org.persona.middleware.service
Class DefaultServiceCaller

java.lang.Object
  org.persona.middleware.service.ServiceCaller
      org.persona.middleware.service.DefaultServiceCaller
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.BusMember, de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.Caller
public class DefaultServiceCaller
extends ServiceCaller

The default service caller simply ignores the notification about losing connection to other instances of the middleware and calls the services either only in an synchronous way (using the method ServiceCaller.call(org.persona.middleware.service.ServiceRequest)) or ignores the asynchronous responses.

Author:
mtazari
